name: Chaos Room (DernieresPensees)
description:
Use of a controller is recommended!

Chaos Room is a fast-paced 20 seconds top down action game. 

Your goal is to survive.

Made for the 20 Seconds game jam 2022 : https://itch.io/jam/20-second-game-jam

Sound Effects : https://www.zapsplat.com/

Controller/Keyboard/Mouse Icons : https://thoseawesomeguys.com/prompts/
